code: const BOOKS_API_URL='/api/books';const CATALOG_API_URL='/api/catalog';export async function getAllBooks(){const res=await fetch(BOOKS_API_URL);return await res.json();}export async function getBookById(id){const res=await fetch("".concat(BOOKS_API_URL,"/").concat(id));return await res.json();}export async function addBookToCatalog(id){const res=await fetch("".concat(CATALOG_API_URL,"/").concat(id),{method:'POST'});return await res.json();}export async function removeBookfromCatalog(id){const res=await fetch("".concat(CATALOG_API_URL,"/").concat(id),{method:'DELETE'});return await res.json();}
